avatar.title: Picture
avatar.subtitle: My profile picture is visible to everyone on any app using Misakey

content.intro:
Your personnal data protection is our mission. You can at any moment ask for the deletion of your account and your data.
This deletion is permanent: we do not keep backup of your data once deleted.
content.whatDeleteContent: If you ask for account deletion, here is what will be deleted<1><0>Your account, password and the keys of your vault</0><1>The files you saved in the space My documents‚Äù</1><2>All the private spaces you created and the content of those spaces</2><3>All you connexion history and related data</3></1>
content.whatNotDeleteContent: If you ask for account deletion, here is what will not be deleted (but you can delete them manually before):<1><0>The files and messages you sent in spaces you joined.</0><1>Those files and messages will remain attached to an anonymous user (as your user won't exist anymore in our system)</1><2>The files you sent to other users that they saved</2></1>
content.howToContent:
If you want to delete your account, you just have to send an email to our DPO (<1>dpo@misakey.com), asking for deletion.

We will answer your request shortly, it won't be longer than 30 days.

public.subtitle: Public profile will be visible to everyone

accountColors.title: My color
accountColors.subtitle: I define the main color of my interface
accountColors.success: My color has been successfully updated

password.new: Which password do you want to use ?
password.title: Password
password.subtitle: Your account is secured with a password

MFA.title: Multi-Factor Authentication
MFA.description: Authentication by passwords is a method that can be compromised. Multi-Factor Authentication enforces the security of your account by requiring several kinds of checks to prove your identity during the authentication flow.

subtitle.activated: Your account is secured with Multi-Factor Authentication
subtitle.deactivated: Secure your account with Multi-Factor Authentication

confirm.title: Update Multi-Factor Authentication method
confirm.subtitle: You can use only one MFA method at a time. This is going to replace your current MFA method (your configuration will not be affected, you can reactivate it later).

totp.title: Time-based One-time Password
totp.subtitle: Automatically generate a One-Time-Password from a physical device

resetConfig.text: Your account has a TOTP configuration

noConfig.text: You have no TOTP configuration registered

subtitle.register: Flash the generated flashcode with your TOTP application and fill the form with the code obtained in the application
subtitle.recovery:
Here are your recovery codes. Save them carefully, they allow you to recover access to your account in case of problem.
You can download them as a file or copy then save them in a secure place.

webauthn.title: Universal Second Factor
webauthn.subtitle: Connect with an external security key supporting FIDO standard (Fast Identity Online).

devicesList.title: Registered devices
devicesList.empty:
You haven't registered any device yet.
Add one to be able to activate Multi-Factor Authentication.

confirmDelete.title: Delete device
confirmDelete.subtitle: This is your only registered device, deleting it will disable Multi-Factor Authentication

registerDeviceDialog.title: Save the device
registerDeviceDialog.subtitle: Name the device to easily find it in your list
registerDeviceDialog.label: Device name

info.general: Data in this vault are cyphered with a private key. When I lose my password, this private key is no more accessible.
info.exportInfo: Saving my private key helps me keep access to my vault. I am advised not to share my private key with anyone.

importKey.title: Restore a private key
importKey.helperText: I recover access to a vault which password was lost.

importButton.noNewSecretKeys: No new private key to import
importButton.error: An error occurred during file import
